name: Fruit of Hydrangea
description:
Fruit of hydrangea is a game made for the weekly game jam - week 249, with the theme "mysterious fruit". 

You find yourself in a dungeon with only you, a tree and som slimy ghosts. Throw the fruit to kill the ghosts but throw to many and you will block yourself up and therefor cannot complete the level.

Move - wasd

Shoot - Left click

Restart - R

Speedrun including glitches/bugs: 45 sec by YS Yousef  

check out his itch here: https://ys-yousef.itch.io/
